sentences.sentence: The owner was so irate he almost threw me out of the place.
sentences.translation: 主人那么生气，他差点儿把我从那个地方赶出去。

sentences.sentence: The speech was designed to pacify the irate crowd.
sentences.translation: 讲话的目的是安抚愤怒的群众。

sentences.sentence: Customer support calls from VIPs — Very Irate Persons — are down.
sentences.translation: 来自VIP(非常生气的人)的客户支持呼叫随之下降。
